ar_BH {
    Version{"2.0"}
    calendar {
        gregorian {
           weekend:intvector {
             5, 0,   // onset dow, millis in day  (Thursday 12:00am)
             7, 0    // cease dow, millis in day  (Friday   12:00am)
           }
        }
    }
}
